column2: ggplot(top_down_mRNA, aes(x = reorder(GeneSymbol, log2FC), y = log2FC, fill = negLog10P)) + geom_col() + scale_fill_gradient(low = "lightgreen", high = "darkgreen", name = "-log10(p-value)") + coord_flip() + theme_minimal() + labs(title = "Top 20 Downregulated Genes", x = "Gene Symbol", y = "log2(Fold Change)")
